biotools.summary: Protein-bound Nucleic Acid filters and fragment libraries (protNAff) is a tool to create filters that select structures of Protein - Nucleic acids complexes from the PDB and to build libraries of protein-bound RNA fragments.

bioschemas.name: protNAff
bioschemas.summary: Protein-bound Nucleic Acid filters and fragment libraries (protNAff) is a tool to create filters that select structures of Protein - Nucleic acids complexes from the PDB and to build libraries of protein-bound RNA fragments.
